title: Sensing Hardware System Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with physical space.
description: The Vision Products Group (VPG) at Apple is currently looking for an exceptional candidate for a sense hardware architecture engineer.
preferred_qualifications:
- Good understanding of optical and/or IMU sensors and signal processing.
- Large scale data analysis and knowledge of statistical techniques.
- Strong communication, documentation and presentation skills.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200.
